name: Arbesko
description: A Swedish company that manufactures occupational footwear.

items.name: Homepage
items.description:
The primary feature of the Homepage is the scrolling content pane located just beneath the header. This will feature multiple panes which can be anything from a simple image or an animation, all the way up to more interactive content.
The Arbesko Catalog button will open a popup image which lets the user choose the desired language of catalog to download.
The browse online button will lead users to the catalog, where they can explore all of the products online.
Clicking on Arbesko Videos will go to a special page showing a grid of all of your videos. Clicking on the actual video screenshot will open up the video inside of a 'black popup' similar to the PDF download.

items.name: Catalog Download Popup
items.description: Please ignore the lack of proper background overlay for this demo. The entire screen will be dimmed and the user's focus will be on the box, which prompts them to select a language. Once clicked, their download will begin.

items.name: Blog
items.description: The blog will serve as an area for product updates and company news, and for Swedish visitors (and possibly US visitors) the Ask Arbesko will be visible.

items.name: Added Value
items.description: This page shows the grid of various added special abilities of Arbesko footwear.

items.name: Added Value › Stability System
items.description:
This is a good example of a sub-page, specifically one of Arbesko's added values: Stability System.
A button at the bottom of the page lets visitors explore various products that incorporate the STSY feature.

items.name: Added Value › Super 8
items.description: This is another example of a sub page. This mockup shows an example image on the right side, which makes the page a little more attractive and balanced, while helping to demonstrate the amazing waterproof abilities of Super 8. Most pages will have photos in them.

items.name: Products
items.description:
This page is very incomplete, unfortunately. I wanted to have all of the product pages complete for this phase, but didn't get them finished.
Shown below is a concept for letting visitors browse products by the industry that they work in.

items.name: About Us
items.description: Aside from the addition of the new header, this page has not changed very much. A new sidebar navigation has been added, as well as links to Facebook and Youtube.

items.name: About Us › Cast Medical
items.description: This page has taken some of the new elements from the new base about page, but remains mostly the same.

items.name: Contact Us
items.description: This page has been rearranged a bit, but nothing serious. Colored orange headers were also added in, to match with the homepage and rest of the site.
